delete_word.doc_string: Delete the (sub-)word in front of or after each caret.

args.name: forward
args.doc_string: Whether the forward (sub-)word should be deleted.

delete_file.doc_string: Deletes the given file(s) by moving the file(s) to the system trash bin.

args.name: files
args.doc_string: The absolute path(s) to the given file(s) on disk.

args.name: prompt
args.doc_string: Whether to prompt the user to confirm the deletion by showing a dialog box.

delete_folder.doc_string: Deletes the given folder(s) by moving the folder(s) to the system trash bin.

args.name: dirs
args.doc_string: The absolute path(s) to the given folder(s) on disk.

args.name: prompt
args.doc_string: Whether to prompt the user to confirm the deletion by showing a dialog box.

detect_indentation.doc_string: Guess indentation settings from the text content.

args.name: show_message
args.doc_string: Whether to show a message in the status bar about the guessed indentation settings.

duplicate_line.doc_string: Create a copy of each caret's line.

args.name: by
args.doc_string: The mode of selection. Valid values are words, columns and lines.

args.name: event
args.doc_string: An object that consists of the x & y window coordinates & the button detail via the button key.

args.name: additive
args.doc_string: Whether to add the selection to the existing selection(s).

args.name: subtractive
args.doc_string: Whether to remoove the existing selection(s) before adding the new selection.
